question: What nickname did CNN International give to Bursa due to its automotive industry?
asked_question_translated: Quel surnom CNN International a-t-il donné à Bursa en raison de son industrie automobile ?
answer: CNN International a surnommé Bursa la "Detroit de la Turquie" en raison de son industrie automobile florissante.
answer_translated_eng: CNN International has dubbed Bursa the "Detroit of Turkey" because of its thriving car industry.
